title: 13 Ways to Impress Your Guy with a Romantic Hotel Room

steps.title: The perfect view will add to the ambiance in the room.
steps.content: The perfect view will add to the ambiance in the room. There’s nothing more romantic than overlooking the ocean, landscape, or the city’s best sights. You could also look for amenities that will make your romantic evening even more enjoyable, such as: A nice bathtub A hot tub Room service

steps.title: Nothing says romance like rose petals.
steps.content: Nothing says romance like rose petals . You could start by sprinkling them on the bed in the shape of a heart. Then, sprinkle a few on the floor leading from the hotel room door to the bed. If you like, go ahead and sprinkle them along the flat surfaces. Your guy will know right away what you have in mind for tonight. Save some rose petals for a couple’s bath. Sprinkle a few along the side of the tub and into the water.

steps.title: Candles create perfect romantic lighting.
steps.content: Candles create perfect romantic lighting. Place candles on the hotel room nightstand, entertainment center, and bathroom counter. If there’s a bathtub, you could even place a few candles along the side of the tub. [1] X Research source Tealight candles are small and unscented, so they’re perfect for creating some ambiance. Scented candles will fill the room with a nice smell. Keep in mind that you can only burn one or two at the same time without the smell becoming overwhelming. Flameless candles are a great alternative if your hotel doesn’t allow you to burn candles.

steps.title: Burn a scented candle or spritz a fragrance spray.
steps.content: Burn a scented candle or spritz a fragrance spray . Pick a scent you know your guy likes. If you’re using a spray, simply spritz it onto the sheets and into the air. You could also spray the lampshades on the bedside lamps because the heat from the bulb will diffuse the scent throughout the room. Don’t spray fragrance on a hot light bulb because it could cause the bulb to explode, since the liquid is cold. What scents appeal to men? According to experts, lavender and pumpkin pie scents turn men on, especially if you combine them. [2] X Research source

steps.title: A little mood music will set the tone for a hot hotel rendezvous.
steps.content: A little mood music will set the tone for a hot hotel rendezvous. Listening to music makes people feel great; a good song can actually boost your mood. [3] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source You want your guy and yourself to be in the mood for love, so build a playlist that will ignite his passion. Here are some hot and romantic songs you might like: "Lover" by Taylor Swift "Love on the Brain" by Rihanna "All of Me" by John Legend ”Please Me” by Cardi B feat. Bruno Mars “Starry Eyes” by The Weeknd "No One" by Alicia Keys "Love Me Like You Do" by Ellie Goulding ”Sexual Healing” by Marvin Gaye ”Slow Hands” by Niall Horan ”Need You Tonight” by INXS ”Let’s Get It On” by Marvin Gaye ”Perfect” by Ed Sheeran

steps.title: Looking at flowers actually brings people pleasure.
steps.content: Looking at flowers actually brings people pleasure. They’re naturally stimulating, so they’re perfect for a night of passion. [4] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Roses are a classic option, but you could also get your boyfriend’s favorite flowers. Get creative with how you arrange the flowers in your hotel room. Put a bouquet of flowers on the table or nightstand. Lay individual flowers on the pillows or across the bed. Arrange the flowers on the bed in the shape of a heart or your initials.

steps.title: Little personal touches really ramp up the romance.
steps.content: Little personal touches really ramp up the romance. Tape heart-shaped notes to the walls of the hotel room, the mirror, or the nightstand. You could even leave a love letter on the bed or beside a bouquet of flowers. Tell him how much you love him, or hint at what you plan to do during your night of passion. “I can’t wait to give you my special massage.” “You’re the only guy who gets me hot.” “I love you more every day I know you.”

steps.title: Your man will go crazy for you in a sexy outfit.
steps.content: Your man will go crazy for you in a sexy outfit. After all, guys tend to be aroused by visual stimulation. [5] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Pick lingerie or a robe that makes you feel most confident, then wow him when he walks into your hotel room. Red really turns men on. Your guy may not realize it, but the color red is proven to stoke his passion. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Sipping a little vino or bubbly really gets you in the mood for amour.
steps.content: Sipping a little vino or bubbly really gets you in the mood for amour. Chill a bottle of wine , champagne , or sparkling grape juice in ice and pair it with a set of nice glasses . The hotel might even loan you the bucket and supply you with ice. Not sure what kind of wine to pick? Red wine gives you a sense of pleasure and can be arousing, so it’s perfect for a night of romance. [7] X Trustworthy Source PLOS ONE Online peer-reviewed, open access scientific research journal Go to source

steps.title: Sharing food with someone creates a feeling of love.
steps.content: Sharing food with someone creates a feeling of love. Your guy will feel your passion when you spoil him with tasty treats. [8] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Go with a classic like chocolate covered strawberries or strawberries and whipped cream. Alternatively, pick up a couple of your man’s favorite desserts and display them on a nice plate or silver tray. Maybe some of the whipped cream or icing just happens to fall onto your bodies as you enjoy your hot night together.

steps.title: Pick a nice bottle to really add to the ambiance of the room.
steps.content: Pick a nice bottle to really add to the ambiance of the room. Your guy will see the massage oil and know exactly what you have in mind. Chances are, he’ll be even more excited about feeling your touch on his skin than he’ll be about the other decorations you pick out. When he arrives, give him a massage that will leave him thinking about it long afterward. If you’re using a fragrance spray or a scented candle, you might go with an unscented massage oil so there aren’t too many smells in the air.

steps.title: A hot bubble bath will get his heart racing with anticipation.
steps.content: A hot bubble bath will get his heart racing with anticipation. He won’t be able to stop thinking about you sinking into those bubbles. Create an inviting atmosphere with lightly scented bubbles, soft candlelight, and a sprinkling of rose petals. [9] X Research source While in the bath, massage each other's feet or soap each other up.

steps.title: Satin sheets
steps.content: Satin sheets are sure to put you both in the mood. The silky feel of satin really stimulates your sense of touch. [10] X Research source Go with red sheets to evoke passion, or pick his favorite color to show him you really know him. Fold up the hotel sheets and place them out of sight in the chest of drawers or closet. This way, they don't distract from your decorations!

steps.title: Arrange your swans on the bed to woo your guy.
steps.content: Arrange your swans on the bed to woo your guy. You’re going to need two bath towels to make the swans , which you can grab from the bathroom. When you place them on the bed, press the beaks together so that it looks like they’re kissing. [11] X Research source Sprinkle rose petals around the swans to make them even more romantic.
